name: Smart Heart (TRy Dev)
description:
Controls

1,2,.. - select ambulance #1, #2, .. (Or press LMB on ambulance)

RMB - confirm path for ambulance

Playtime: 10 mins

Game made for Godot Wild Jam #30, theme Heartbeat.

Source code and assets

https://github.com/TRy-Dev/Smart-Heart/

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
